scripts.codegen: yarn generate-manifests && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/ subgraph.internal.mumbai.yaml
scripts.deploy:testnet:mumbai: yarn generate-addresses mumbai && graph deploy caskprotocol/cask-protocol-mumbai subgraph.mumbai.yaml --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy:internal:mumbai: yarn generate-addresses mumbai-internal && graph deploy caskprotocol/cask-protocol-mumbai-internal subgraph.internal.mumbai.yaml --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
